meanings.definition: Lowest in position; situated at the very bottom.
meanings.sent1: The bottommost shelf held the heaviest books.
meanings.sent2: The basement is the bottommost level of the house.
meanings.sent3: The bottommost step creaked loudly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the bottommost layer of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The bottommost drawer contained hidden treasures.

meanings.sent1: The diver reached the bottommost of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The bottommost of the staircase was painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The bottommost of the hill was a perfect spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was the bottommost of his motivations.
meanings.sent5: The bottommost of the waterfall created a mesmerizing view.
